text: it's exciting to be at aws where a lot
of the most interesting database
management work is being done today
what we have is a view that we need a
number of different database services in
order to be able to support the various
things that our customers are trying to
do
we structure our organization to be
entrepreneurial we structure it around
small teams that have lots of
flexibility to build whatever they think
their customers need and to be very
innovative that's also very resonant
with boston which is a pioneering and
entrepreneurial and innovative city
driven by many of the academic
institutions that are around here we
have a wide range of database systems
and we're looking to invest in all of
them in the boston area the boston
seaport area is a great place for people
to be able to work and live close to
their office
aws is a place where you get to do
innovative things that it's hard to do
anywhere else because of the scale the
access to customers and so for people
that are really looking to grow in their
career path there really isn't a better
place to be
